# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/passport-jwt`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for passport-jwt 2.0 (https://github.com/themikenicholson/passport-jwt).

# Details
Files were exported from https://www.github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/types-2.0/passport-jwt

Additional Details
 * Last updated: Mon, 19 Sep 2016 17:28:59 GMT
 * File structure: ProperModule
 * Library Dependencies: none
 * Module Dependencies: express, passport-strategy
 * Global values: none
